forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
